query: instruction: Did they ever announce the release date for the new elder scrolls game?
answer: No, Bethesda has not announced the release date for the new Elder Scrolls game.
result: As of the latest information available until October 2023, Bethesda has not announced an official release date for "The Elder Scrolls VI." The game was officially teased back in 2018, but details about its development and release schedule have been scarce. Fans are eagerly awaiting more news, but so far, the company has focused more on other projects like "Starfield."
